item.title: Remnant 2: Water Harp Puzzle & Secret Song Trophy Guide
item.description:
Remnant 2 ticks all the boxes on the wishlists of players of its prequel, Remnant: From The Ashes, by combining elements of gameplay that challenge both your skills and patience in combat, as well as your ability to solve riddles and puzzles. One such puzzle can be found in Yaesha, where players will need to become familiar with how to play a water harp.

In the forest-like world of Yaesha, players have their musical skills tested as they are tasked with playing the water harp to progress through Remnant 2 's main story. While they are, on the surface, tough riddles to crack, players will discover that the answers may very well be right under their noses. Here is how to solve the Water Harp puzzle in Remnant 2 and earn the Carnage in C-Minor achievement.

How To Solve The Water Harp Puzzle in Remnant 2

In order to complete the Water Harp puzzle, players will first need to continue exploring Yaesha to find their way to the lever that releases the waterfall to operate the harp. To do this, players will need to pass where they encounter Meidra, and continue along the path to her left. After overcoming some enemies, a doorway will appear to walk through.

Players need only follow the path to find the lever that releases the water before continuing along the path to the right of the entrance, which will open a previously locked door. As the checkpoint appears, players should consult the table next to it and open the book lying there. On the first page of the book is the correct combination to play the Water Harp's song. The horizontal lines indicate that no note is being played.

In order to enter the correct combination, players will need to approach the harp and enter the following peg alignment, going by row. Pegs are referred to by their positions from left to right.

  • 1st row: Fifth peg
  • 2nd row: No peg
  • 3rd row: Fourth peg
  • 4th row: No peg
  • 5th row: Third peg
  • 6th row: Fourth peg
  • 7th row: First peg
  • 8th row: No peg

Once the correct combination is entered, players will pull the lever to the left, which plays the song and raises the bridge to the other side.

How To Play The Secret Song (Carnage in C-Minor)

Players looking to complete all the achievements in Remnant 2 will need to play an additional secret song to earn the Carnage in C-Minor trophy. Unlike the main puzzle, this song does not have a written clue to guide players, but an auditory one.

To tick off this objective, players will need to replicate the song played by the Flutist after the Ravager quest has been completed . Despite there only being five note options (six, if skipping a note is included), this can be quite tedious to replicate. For those hoping to reap the rewards of a keen ear, here is the combination of the secret song:

  • 1st row: First peg
  • 2nd row: Fourth peg
  • 3rd row: No peg
  • 4th row: Second peg
  • 5th row: Fifth peg
  • 6th row: No peg
  • 7th row: Third peg
  • 8th row: No peg

Once the song has been completed, players will be able to collect the Bolt Driver handgun in front of the Water Harp. For an extra reward, the Flautist will present the character with a Scroll of Binding if they visit the musician after the song is played.

item.title: Destiny 2 Weekly Reset: New Nightfall, Challenges, and Rewards
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Weekly Nightfall and Modifiers
  • Episode: Echoes Seasonal Challenges
  • Exotic Mission Rotation
  • Raid and Dungeon Rotation
  • Raid Challenges
  • Ritual Activities: Crucible and Gambit
  • Legacy Activities and Challenges
  • Dares of Eternity Rotation
  • Xur Details
  • Trials of Osiris Map and Weekly Adept Weapon

Updated August 2, 2024: Another week has come for Destiny 2 , which means missions, challenges, and rewards have been reset. More changes are on the horizon for Destiny 2 players as Bungie announced upcoming tweaks in future updates. In an effort to revitalize its weekend PvP mode, Destiny 2 is making Adept Weapons easier to obtain in Trials of Osiris. Specifically, the Passage of Persistence will no longer remove wins when playing as a trio and will keep wins as long as a match is completed.

In addition, the exotic class armor is getting easier to farm in Destiny 2 . After plenty of fan feedback, Bungie is planning to add a weekly challenge to the Dual Destiny mission, giving players an exotic class armor drop for finishing the mission for the first time each week per class. On top of that, the chest drop rates are being improved, with even more boosted rates for participating inside the daily Overthrow location. The changes are being made to make it slightly easier to farm the equipment in the hopes of getting the specific drop players are looking for.

In the meantime, the Destiny 2 weekly reset continues right along with its usual refreshed content, activities, and rewards for players to chase over the next week. For a complete look at all the new content available for the week of July 30, including Nightfalls, Crucible modes, and challenges, here is everything players need to know.

Weekly Nightfall and Modifiers

Nightfall Strike : Exodus Crash - Double Drops!

Advanced Modifiers:

  • Champions : Overload and Barrier
  • Hero Modifiers: Extra Shields. Void, Solar, and Arc.
  • Galvanized : Combatants have more health and are more difficult to stun.
  • Overcharge : Rocket Launcher and Kinetic Weapons when the player's subclass matches an active Surge element.
  • Arach-NO! : When defeated, Fallen Vandals spawn a web mine at their feet.
  • Threat : Arc
  • Surge : Solar and Arc

Expert Modifiers:

  • All previous modifiers.
  • Equipment Locked : Unable to change equipment once the mission starts.

Master Modifiers:

  • All previous modifiers.
  • Famine : All ammunition drops are significantly reduced.
  • Master Modifiers : Locked Loadout, Extra Champions, and Extra Shields.

Grandmaster Modifiers:

  • All previous modifiers.
  • Chaff : Radar is disabled.
  • Master Modifiers : Extinguish, Limited Revives, Contest, and Join In Progress Disabled.

_______________________________________________________________

  • Nightfall Weapon : Warden's Law (Adept Hand Cannon)

Episode: Echoes Seasonal Challenges

Week 9

  1. Discoveries III : Complete Act II Part III of "A Rising Chorus."
  2. Research and Development VI : Complete the research quest for Specimen ID: 006.
  3. Nessian Expert : Complete the Episode: Echoes Battlegrounds on Expert difficulty.
  4. Echoed Bounties : Complete bounties from Failsafe in the H.E.L.M.
  5. Echoed Challenger - Act II : Complete all 16 Act II weekly activity challenges.
  6. Nessus Activities : On Nessus, earn progress by completing bounties, patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors.
  7. Most Dangerous Prey : Defeat 50 Guardians in Gambit or Crucible.
  8. Taking All Challenges : Complete 3 weekly playlist challenges, including Vanguard Ops, Crucible, or seasonal activities.
  9. Calibrate Close Range : Calibrate 400 close-range weapons-Sidearms, Submachine Guns, Shotguns, Glaives, and Swords. Bonus progress against Guardians.

Exotic Mission Rotation

Bungie brought back various exotic missions for players to run through to earn new rewards, gear, as well as craftable versions of exotic weapons. Like the Raid and Dungeon rotator, this one changes on a weekly basis.

Featured Exotic Mission : Starcrossed (Wishkeeper Exotic Combat Bow)

Raid and Dungeon Rotation

Originally introduced during Season 17, Bungie features Raids and Dungeons in a weekly rotation to make them farmable with updated rewards.

  • Featured Raid : Last Wish
  • Featured Dungeon : Spire of the Watcher

Raid Challenges

  • Salvation's Edge : Varied Geometry, Coordinated Efforts, At Capacity, Balanced Diet, Scenic Route
  • Deep Stone Crypt : Copies of Copies
  • Vow of the Disciple : Looping Catalyst
  • Vault of Glass : Strangers in Time
  • King's Fall : Gaze Amaze
  • Root of Nightmares : Cosmic Equilibrium
  • Garden of Salvation : TBD
  • Last Wish : Which Witch, Summoning Ritual, Forever Fight, Keep Out, Strength of Memory

Ritual Activities: Crucible and Gambit

Players can earn additional rewards through Destiny 2 's Pathfinder system simply by playing and performing certain tasks in ritual activities like Vanguard Strikes, Crucible, and Gambit.

  • Weekly Crucible Modes : Momentum Control, Showdown, and Rumble
  • Gambit

Legacy Activities and Challenges

Europa

  • Exo Challenge : Simulation: Agility
  • Eclipsed Zone : Asterion Abyss
  • Empire Hunt : Phylaks: The Warrior

Neomuna

  • Incursion Zone : Ahimsa Park
  • Campaign Mission : Desperate Measures
  • Partition: Ordinance

Throne World

  • Weekly Story Mission : The Ghosts. Fire Pit modifier as well as Overload and Unstoppable champions.
  • Altars of Reflection : Weekly activity that players can take on through specifically marked icons within the Throne World. These missions typically involve light puzzle solving as well as battling enemy combatants.

The Moon

  • Trove Guardian: Anchor of Light
  • Wandering Nightmare: Nightmare of Xortal, Sworn of Crota (Sorrow's Harbor)
  • Campaign : A Mysterious Disturbance

Nightmare Rotation:

  • Taniks (Isolation)
  • Ghaul (Rage)
  • Zydron (Servitude)

Dreaming City

  • The Dreaming City Curse Level : Rising - The Oracle Engine mission
  • Petra Venj Location : Divalian Mists
  • The Blind Well : Hive enemies - Plague: Cragur
  • Ascendant Challenge : Shattered Ruins (Spine of Keres).

Dares of Eternity Rotation

  • Round 1 : Fallen
  • Round 2 : Hive
  • Final Round : Zydron

Xur Details

Xur, the exotic merchant of Destiny 2 , arrives every weekend until reset, giving players a short window to check out what he has in stock. With The Final Shape, Xur has seen a rework of what is on offer. Here's what the merchant has for the weekend of 8/2:

  • Sunbracers (Warlock gauntlets)
  • Orpheus Rig (Hunter leg armor)
  • Heart of Inmost Light (Titan chest armor)
  • Riskrunner (SMG)
  • Arbalest (Linear Fusion Rifle)
  • Black Talon (Heavy Sword)
  • Hawkmoon (Hand Cannon)
  • Coldheart Catalyst
  • Colony Catalyst
  • Exotic Engram
  • Gunsmith Engram
  • Glimmer
  • Ascendant Shard
  • Enhancement Cores
  • Strange Gift (Random Item for 1 Strange Coin)
  • Gnawing Hunger (Energy Auto Rifle)
  • Wolftone Draw (Energy Combat Bow)
  • Seventh Seraph VY-7 (Energy Submachine Gun)
  • Tarnished Mettle (Energy Scout Rifle)
  • Code Duello (Heavy Rocket Launcher)
  • Sailspy Pitchglass (Heavy Linear Fusion Rifle)
  • Crown-Splitter/Quickfang/Eternity's Edge (Heavy Sword)
  • Strange Weapon Engram
  • Holdfast Armor Set

Make sure to check back every Friday for a comprehensive breakdown of all the new exotic gear and rolls that Xur brings to Destiny 2 .

Trials of Osiris Map and Weekly Adept Weapon

Saint-14 and the Trails of Osiris offer players a high-end PvP activity in exchange for powerful rewards, especially for players who go flawless and earn a trip to the Lighthouse. Similar to most vendors in Destiny 2 , Saint-14 has a reputation system that rewards players for ranking up through playing and completing bounties.

Trials of Osiris for 8/2:

  • Map : Javelin-4
  • Weapon : Incisor (Adept Trace Rifle)

item.title: How MyPopGoes' Full Steam Release Makes the FNAF Spin-Off Feel Like a Whole New Game
item.description:
Highlights

  • MyPopGoes brings 90s nostalgia to Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, with a full version of the FNAF spin-off available now on Steam.
  • The full release includes new modes, unlockables, and story content for fans old and new.
  • Players can uncover secrets, view multiple endings, and encounter familiar faces in this canon FNAF release.

MyPopGoes is a Five Nights at Freddy’s spin-off by developer Kane Hodder, produced by the Fazbear Fanzverse Initiative. One of a variety of PopGoes titles, MyPopGoes sees players attempt to keep a 90s-era digital pet alive and entertained at Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza. A free, early version of the game was released on GameJolt in 2023, allowing fans to experience its campaign. However, this week’s Five Nights at Freddy’s 10th Anniversary Celebration has kicked off with the full, paid version of MyPopGoes launching on Steam. While the free version is still available for fans wishing to experience the base offering, fans and newcomers alike shouldn’t dismiss this newest version. MyPopGoe 's full Steam release makes the FNAF spin-off feel like a whole new game.

MyPopGoes is a canon entry in the FNAF Fanverse’s PopGoes timeline and follows Bonnie Glade, who receives a digital pet of PopGoes the Weasel for her 10th birthday. To “survive” the title’s five nights, Bonnie must keep PopGoes alive by helping him cook and eat pizza, giving him soda to drink, and keeping him entertained. Initially released as a joke in April 2023, developer Kane Hodder has now turned MyPopGoes into a full-fledged spin-off, complete with dark and shocking lore reveals. What’s more, this week’s Steam release hides a few big surprises for those familiar with the larger FNAF narrative and MyPopGoes timeline.

MyPopGoes’ Steam Release is Packed With Additional Gameplay Content

While the original MyPopGoes started as a joke release, its early version delivered a compellingly simple resource management sim. In classic FNAF fashion, its campaign was spread across five rounds, with each turning up the difficulty and revealing new insights into its larger narrative. Fans who completed the challenge were rewarded with a single ending, before being invited to test their skill in a new mode, Endless Day. With the release of the full MyPopGoes this week, fans can experience these elements and so much more.

In addition to an updated version of the early version’s campaign, MyPopGoes ’ full Steam release includes a plethora of new content. In addition to its Endless Day mode, the full release includes five Challenge Days and five Special Modes, including Fishing, Longest Day, and Topping Juggle. Completionists will have their hands full with the newest version of MyPopGoes , as Hodder has added a wide range of unlockables to the title, including 21 achievements, six unlockable characters, a variety of Diary Entries and Stickers, and Character Bios. On the tech side, MyPopGoes Steam release also adds Spanish Language Translation and Controller Support. However, MyPopGoes ’ updates aren’t just gameplay-related, and fans of longtime FNAF and PopGoes fans will be happy to know that the Steam release includes a host of fresh story content as well.

MyPopGoes Full Release Features New Secrets and Endings

The early release version of MyPopGoes features a blink-and-you-’ll-miss-it reveal, before the credits roll. However, fans who beat the base game in the Steam version will be greeted by a message following this scene, revealing it to be the first of three endings featured in the title. What’s more, MyPopGoes’ various mini-games and Challenge Days hide their own secrets. Fans who pass through a flashing segment of a mini-game’s border or satisfy a hidden condition may even catch a glimpse of some familiar faces from Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza, should they be diligent.

MyPopGoes ’ Steam release evolves the original demo-length experience into a full-fledged spin-off. While the base campaign remains intact, its additional modes, Challenge Days, secrets, and unlockables make it feel like a whole new game. MyPopGoes ’ is a fun experience on its own, but its role as a prologue to PopGoes Evergreen and PopGoes Arcade bodes well for this branch of the Fanverse Initiative. MyPopGoes ’ Steam version is the first of eight events taking place during the Five Nights at Freddy’s 10th Anniversary Celebration. Fans of both FNAF and the Fanverse Initiative should be sure to follow along as the week unfolds, as even more spin-off experiences, and a major announcement, are set to arrive before the party ends.

item.title: How to Play Fallout London With an Existing Character
item.description:
Fallout London is an amazing mod, but players aren't able to transfer their character over from their original playthrough of Fallout 4. Considering the original game is set in Boston, MA, in the United States, and the mod is based in London, England, within the UK, it isn't too shocking to learn that players would need a brand new character to play.

However, the fact that they needed a new character upset some fans of the franchise, which inspired some modders to figure out how to get their existing character from the original game over to the mod. Here's a guide to how some players have been able to get their character over from the game (which was originally mentioned on Reddit by user Pqblo.

Console commands are required for this, so if players cannot enter console commands, this will not work.

How To Get Your Fallout 4 Character To London

After downloading the mod, players will be able to move their existing save file into the mod, but it isn't as straightforward as players would want it to be. To begin with, players will need to get on the Fallout 4 save. Then, they will want to teleport to " Mysterious Scientists 1 ," which can be done by typing the following into the console command bar: " player.moveto 0719c0c7 ". After that, they will find themselves within a wall, but by using the console command to clip through walls (done by typing " tcl " in the console commands), players will be able to leave the wall and will find themselves in London. Type in the console command to clip through walls again to turn that off, and players are now able to play the game like normal.

  1. Download the mod
  2. Get onto Fallout 4 with the existing character
  3. Typ in player.moveto 0719c0c7
  4. Type in tcl
  5. Leave the wall
  6. Type in tcl again
  7. Play as normal

Does This Cause Any Glitches Or Crashes?

As of right now, those who have tried this glitch to get their character into the mod's world haven't reported any issues. In fact, most have mentioned that it didn't cause issues with the mod or the base game, allowing them to truly enjoy their time in London. Additionally, they were able to bring over their favorite companions, which made all the work worthwhile for most players who tried this.

While there aren't any reported issues with doing this, please note that that doesn't mean it isn't possible that it will mess with the game at some point or another.

item.title: The Last of Us Part II - Official Story Trailer
item.description: Ellie's harrowing and heartbreaking tale continues in The Last of Us Part 2, pushing Naughty Dog's action-adventure series to even greater heights of drama.
